name: Stack Stones
description:
STACK STONES, a physics based multiplayer stacking and party game. Enjoy playing alone to beat your former best mark or compete against others in funny multiplayer matches ... but watch out for your opponents, they want to smash your stack!




Build your stack and reach the height target as fast and with as less stones as you can.
The higher you go, the less stable your stack will get, so be careful!
Enjoy all if this in different game modes like ...

  • ... Stack Race
  • ... Last Stack Standing
  • ... Puzzle Speed Stacking
  • ... Stone Rain





Look for items helping you to build faster, protect your stack or attack your opponents stacks.
Featured item categories are ...

  • ... Helpers (for building better stacks)
  • ... Defense (for protecting your stack)
  • ... Offense (to destroy opponent stacks)
  • ... Disaster (affecting all players)





Watch out for nasty attacks affecting dedicated players or all players.
Protect yourself by either ...

  • ... be as fast as possible
  • ... use items or stones to protect your stack
  • ... build your stack "bullet proof"
